content.text: 0) In a mixing bowl, cream butter, shortening and sugars.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "cream"@21:26 / AC
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a mixing bowl"@6:19 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "butter"@27:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "shortening"@35:45 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "sugars"@50:56 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-2 )
			:ref ( ing-3 )
		)
	)
)

content.text: 1) Add egg and extracts; mix well.
2) Combine the next eight ingredients; gradually add to the creamed mixture.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "the next eight ingredients"@11:37 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-7 )
			:ref ( ing-8 )
			:ref ( ing-9 )
			:ref ( ing-10 )
			:ref ( ing-11 )
			:ref ( ing-12 )
			:ref ( ing-13 )
			:ref ( ing-14 )
		)
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "add"@49:52 / AC
		:ppt ( "the creamed mixture"@56:75 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Shape into 1-in balls; roll in sugar apart on ungreased baking sheets.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Shape"@3:8 / AC
		:todo ( "1-in balls"@14:24 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "roll in"@26:33 / AC
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "ungreased baking sheets"@49:72 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-15 "sugar"@34:39 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Bake at 350 degrees F (177 degrees C) for 10-15 minutes or until lightly browned.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:heat ( temp-4-0 "350 degrees F"@11:24 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-4-1 "177 degrees C"@-1:-1 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "10-15 minutes"@-1:-1 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until lightly browned"@-1:-1 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
